amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for the Department of Transportation's Financial Management account by $5 million and to increase funds for the Operations for Vehicle Safety account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funds for Financial Management Capital by $5,000,00, and redirect it to National Highway Traffic Safety Administration operations and research account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 222 (Roll no. 416).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 222 (Roll no. 416).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Connolly (VA).
